Articles.Content: I see a v0.6 rebalance in the near future
Download link is broken No moon landing for me
Needs a mirror download, Dropbox is saying you are getting too much traffic and disabled your DL link.
download link broken.. talk about unreliable rocket parts!

That\'s my fault, I tried hosting a 0.12x1 mirror on dropbox...

They didn\'t like that.
Do you want me to put a copy up on my website Nova? I think I\'ve got a copy of the SIDR zip lying around too....
Please do, I NEED IT. XD

yeah, dropbox says Nova\'s account has been generating too much traffic (i wonder why :), so downloading from it has been disabled, it seems....

you could start a google-code project to host it, you know.... the CFG\'s qualify as 'open source' to a reasonable extent :cheers:

Do you want me to put a copy up on my website Nova? I think I\'ve got a copy of the SIDR zip lying around too....

That\'d be excellent, I\'m trying to download it and it isn\'t letting me. I am displeased by this.
I\'m going to host it elsewhere, but anyone else is welcome to make mirrors.
Please hurry up, I\'m losing my miiiind! =P

http://www./?xf7evi8v7x1nexo

I\'ll upload the new version soonish
Excellent.
Here\'s 0.6 http://www./?l8f79c5ts9dgrlu
What are the changes?

Engine gimballing enabled on several engines

Lander engine fuel consumption increased to 1.5 (was 1)

Fairings shortened a bit

Mk4 pod no longer explodes if it lands on land

Lander engine fuel consumption increased to 1.5 (was 1)

Oh, this makes things a lot more interesting. No more two stage mun rockets as the tiny lander probably won\'t have enough fuel capacity now. Needs more fuel, so needs more boosters.
how does engine gimballing work? do you press something and its enabled or its atomically on?

Its automatic, like adding control wings or RCS blocks (but doesn\'t require a toggle like RCS)

The engine reads input and swivels to help turn the ship in the required direction - the only requirement is that the engine be burning, and throttle does affect it.

Its also used by Advanced SAS if you turn it on, as well.
ty

Here\'s 0.6 http://www./?l8f79c5ts9dgrlu

Not sure if it\'s just me, but the SAS modules have disappeared. The only one left is the 1m ASAS.

It\'s not just you-they\'ve been removed, because they are basically a placeholder from the early game-a completely unrealistic means of providing control, by conjuring huge amounts of torque out of nowhere.

It\'s not just you-they\'ve been removed, because they are basically a placeholder from the early game-a completely unrealistic means of providing control, by conjuring huge amounts of torque out of nowhere.

Oh so they\'re supposed to be gone? Well any chance of a 2m ASAS then?

Oh so they\'re supposed to be gone? Well any chance of a 2m ASAS then?

Agreed. This is definitely needed.
